## Hls.(constructor)

Creates an instance of an HLS client that can attach to exactly one `HTMLMediaElement`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(userConfig?: Partial<HlsConfig>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  userConfig | Partial&lt;[HlsConfig](./hls.js.hlsconfig.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Configuration options applied over <code>Hls.DefaultConfig</code> |
